projects.name: Intervu
projects.summary: AI-powered career planning and interview platform
description: Developed an AI-powered career planning platform, featuring interview practice, resume optimization, and personalized roadmaps
Integrated Google Gemini and GCP Speech-to-Text APIs for voice recognition, content generation, and interview feedback
Designed and managed RESTful APIs and a PostgreSQL database, leveraging JSON storage for handling of AI-generated content
Leveraged Vercel Analytics to monitor frontend performance and user engagement, maintaining a ~28% bounce rate
Utilized Swagger UI for API documentation and designed 10+ unit tests, reducing API-related bugs by 12%

projects.name: AutoAudit
description: Developed an AI-powered expense management platform to automate expense categorization and policy enforcement
Leveraged React Query for efficient data caching, reducing request load times by ~17% and improving responsiveness
Integrated OpenAI's GPT-5-nano model for expense categorization, using a validation layer to prevent hallucination

projects.name: DevCollab
description: Created a platform for developers to post projects and connect with others to build, contribute to, and showcase technical work
Streamlined backend logic by linking accounts via Firebase UIDs, reducing API errors by 40% and simplifying authorization
Optimized MongoDB queries for efficient pagination and UID-based lookups, reducing average API response time by ~15%
Utilized Insomnia to test and debug RESTful APIs, ensuring reliable endpoint behavior throughout development

projects.name: FitSense
projects.summary: Tracking workouts, set goals, and create custom fitness plans
description: Implemented scalable Firebase Authentication, supporting up to 1,000 users with 99.9% uptime for seamless and secure access
Optimized Firestore operations, reducing workout plan CRUD operation latency by 15% and supporting 50+ concurrent users
